WoqSju4dL0vhZY9UyRfEMA.text: Wonderful smoothies and porridge.  Fantastic service and lovely conversation.  A must see for a wonderful visit and experience

aI5Nk8gDFczq8-t2atllQQ.text: Marvelous little cafe serving the most delicious breakfast bowls, turmeric lattes, and vegan items. Lovely staff and warm atmosphere. If you need a break from the traditional Scottish breakfast, this place is an oasis. Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of Brochan - Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Photo of Brochan - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

e6vSzzhqhyCCD5H7CwiXWA.text: After a week of exploring traditional and hearty Scottish cuisine, it was so refreshing to sit down to a healthy breakfast and refuel at Brochan. The staff is warm and friendly, the porridge tasted perfectly fresh, and presentation was positively radiant. Thank you, Brochan, for the perfect breakfast experience before we fly home! We will definitely be back! :)

photos.caption: Photo of Brochan - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Turmeric Latte was to-die-for!!!
Photo of Brochan - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Turmeric Pistachio Porridge :)
Photo of Brochan - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Banoffe Porridge :)

TAEUrp9cJCprvuXKorSIpw.text: Brochan is such a lovely addition to the Marchmont neighborhood. The owner Elaine has created a cafe with a lovely, light vibe and amazing food. The oatmeal is delicious and comes with awesome toppings (once I had some vegan brownie topping fresh out of the oven which was amazing). The cakes, cookies and coffee are also lovely. Brochan is a great place to meet up with friends or study--I'm moving and I'm going to miss it!
